title: How Children Can Change You (with Mitch Albom)
description:
Mitch Albom, best-selling author of Tuesdays with Morrie, is on the show to talk about his latest book, Finding Chika: A Little Girl, an Earthquake, and the Making of a Family, and his new podcast, Tuesday People.

Guest Links: Mitch Albom 

https://www.mitchalbom.com/tuesday-people/

https://havefaithhaiti.org/


Check out Jillian's New Year sale for My Fitness App at https://go.jillianmichaels.com/lzN0kjLqw2

Send us your brief question at jillianpodcast@gmail.com
